content: drops design pattern w-669 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- one coaster weighs approx 15 g ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 12 cm / 4¾ in diameter materials drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g color 02 light turquoise 50 g color 16 white 50 g color no 100 light wash 50 g color 30 gray blue 50 g color 41 mustard 50 g color 07 heather 50 g color no 33 medium pink 50 g color 39 pistachio 50 g color 27 peach 50 g color 01 apricot 50 g color 35 vanilla 50 g color no 14 strong yellow 50 g color 20 light pink 50 g color 38 raspberry piece can also be crochet with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group c - see link below drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or size needed to get 18 double crochets = width 10 cm / 4
